A

addSubject(int, String, GradeBook.GradeType) - Method in class ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook.GradeBook
Add a subject to receive a grade in certain semester.

B

BOOL_CREDIT - ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook.GradeBook.GradeType
Student gets 1 if passes some threshold by working during the semester, 0 otherwise.

D

DIFFERENTIATED_CREDIT - ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook.GradeBook.GradeType
Student's work during semester is evaluated from 0 to 5.

E

EXAM - ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook.GradeBook.GradeType
Student's answer on an exam is evaluated from 0 to 5.

GradeBook.GradeType - Enum in ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook
